page.title: 10HOSIERY
page.content: {Paton and Baldwin's }factory makes ten tons of wool a day.They make over a hundred different colours.A cashmere and silk jumper would cost you over a hundred pounds.The factory employs between two hundred and two hundred and fifty people.The average weight of a ball of wool is about one Kilogram. Other wools they spin include Alpacca, Angora, Lambswool and Shetland Sheep. The mill at Lumsdale washes, bleaches and dyes the yarn.Dyes are mixed and made exactly the right colour.They do not knit at Paton and Baldwin's .They mix.
